product.title: Godrej No.1 Lime & Aloe Vera (150g), Pack of 4 - High TFM (Grade 1 Soap), Long-Lasting Fragrance
product.categories_flat: Beauty > Bath & Body > Cleansers > Solid Soap Bars
product.description: Favored by over 380 million consumers, Godrej No.1 offers you 'Nature's way to beauty with carefully chosen natural ingredients to make your skin naturally beautiful. It is Grade 1 quality soap and the highest-selling soap of its kind in the country. Godrej No.1 Lime & Aloe Vera soap is enriched with the goodness of Aloe Vera that moisturizes the skin and enchanting fragrance of lime which gives you soft and beautiful skin, naturally. It preserves the young nature of your skin giving you a perfect complexion. It protects your skin and gives you a youthful and young look.
feature_bullets: Contains: 4 units of Godrej No. 1 Lime & Aloe Vera (150g each)
HIGH QUALITY: High TFM (Grade 1 soap) that keeps your skin healthy and glowing
CONTAINS NATURAL OILS: Gives you soft and beautiful skin
ENRICHED WITH GOODNESS OF LIME AND ALOE VERA: Leaves your skin feeling fresh and soft
LASTING FRAGRANCE: Long-lasting refreshing fragrance that keeps you fresh and confident all day
SUITABLE FOR: Bathing soap for all skin types and all age groups
product.feature_bullets_flat: SUITABLE FOR: Bathing soap for all skin types and all age groups. LASTING FRAGRANCE: Long-lasting refreshing fragrance that keeps you fresh and confident all day. ENRICHED WITH GOODNESS OF LIME AND ALOE VERA: Leaves your skin feeling fresh and soft. CONTAINS NATURAL OILS: Gives you soft and beautiful skin. HIGH QUALITY: High TFM (Grade 1 soap) that keeps your skin healthy and glowing. Contains: 4 units of Godrej No. 1 Lime & Aloe Vera (150g each).

sections.title: Legal Disclaimer:
sections.body: While we work to ensure that product information is correct, on occasion manufacturers may alter their ingredient lists. Actual product packaging and materials may contain more and/or different information than that shown on our web site. We recommend that you do not solely rely on the information presented and that you always read labels, warnings, and directions before using or consuming a product. For additional information about a product, please contact the manufacturer.

top_reviews.title: The best grade 1 soap at this price.
top_reviews.body: I am fond of Godrej soaps. Both Cinthol and No.1 are very good Grade1 soaps at a reasonably low price, which means they don't get soft with moisture like another brand 'lifesaver' made by an multinational company. Also thanks to Amazon for the great discounts.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I am fond of Godrej soaps. Both Cinthol and No.1 are very good Grade1 soaps at a reasonably low price, which means they don't get soft with moisture like another brand 'lifesaver' made by an multinational company. Also thanks to Amazon for the great discounts.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Surprisingly a good soap
top_reviews.body: I regularly use Control fresh soap. This time I wanted to give a try since this is also a godrej product.  Nice fragrance that reminds yesteryears' Cinthol lime ( green color wrapper ) .. overalls it's a value for money.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I regularly use Control fresh soap. This time I wanted to give a try since this is also a godrej product.

Nice fragrance that reminds yesteryears' Cinthol lime ( green color wrapper ) .. overalls it's a value for money.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Good budget soap.
top_reviews.body: This soap is really cheap and good for daily use. The scent is not that good but what can you expect from a product this cheap. It doesn't dissolve or disintegrate easily like other soaps. Finally it cleans and gets the job done.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
This soap is really cheap and good for daily use. The scent is not that good but what can you expect from a product this cheap. It doesn't dissolve or disintegrate easily like other soaps. Finally it cleans and gets the job done.
Read more

top_reviews.title: The worst saop.
top_reviews.body: It is only good for washing hands. Not at all good for bathing purpose.Since it the cheapest soap , therefore, it is widely used for bathing in villages across India.Read more

top_reviews.title: Very satisfactory
top_reviews.body: Very good product from Godrej. Smells good and moisturizing is fantastic. But it melts very fast. I purchased it by paying more than the printed mrp and the reason behind it is beyond my understanding.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
